00074 void clip_draw_curfra_label(SpaceClip *sc, float x, float y)
00075 {
00076     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
00077     int fontid = style->widget.uifont_id;
00078     char numstr[32];
00079     float font_dims[2] = {0.0f, 0.0f};
00080 
00081     /* frame number */
00082     BLF_size(fontid, 11.0f, U.dpi);
00083     BLI_snprintf(numstr, sizeof(numstr), "%d", sc->user.framenr);
00084 
00085     BLF_width_and_height(fontid, numstr, &font_dims[0], &font_dims[1]);
00086 
00087     glRecti(x, y, x + font_dims[0] + 6.0f, y + font_dims[1] + 4.0f);
00088 
00089     UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
00090     BLF_position(fontid, x+2.0f, y+2.0f, 0.0f);
00091     BLF_draw(fontid, numstr, sizeof(numstr));
00092 }

00094 static void draw_movieclip_cache(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, MovieClip *clip, Scene *scene)
00095 {
00096     float x;
00097     int *points, totseg, i, a;
00098     float sfra = SFRA, efra = EFRA, framelen = ar->winx / (efra - sfra + 1);
00099     MovieTrackingTrack *act_track = BKE_tracking_active_track(&clip->tracking);
00100     MovieTrackingReconstruction *reconstruction = BKE_tracking_get_reconstruction(&clip->tracking);
00101 
00102     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00103 
00104     /* cache background */
00105     glColor4ub(128, 128, 255, 64);
00106     glRecti(0, 0, ar->winx, 8);
00107 
00108     /* cached segments -- could be usefu lto debug caching strategies */
00109     BKE_movieclip_get_cache_segments(clip, &sc->user, &totseg, &points);
00110     if (totseg) {
00111         glColor4ub(128, 128, 255, 128);
00112 
00113         for (a = 0; a < totseg; a++) {
00114             float x1, x2;
00115 
00116             x1 = (points[a * 2] - sfra) / (efra - sfra + 1) * ar->winx;
00117             x2 = (points[a * 2 + 1] - sfra + 1) / (efra - sfra + 1) * ar->winx;
00118 
00119             glRecti(x1, 0, x2, 8);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123     /* track */
00124     if (act_track) {
00125         MovieTrackingTrack *track = act_track;
00126 
00127         for (i = sfra, a = 0; i <= efra; i++) {
00128             int framenr;
00129             MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00130 
00131             while (a<track->markersnr) {
00132                 if (track->markers[a].framenr >= i)
00133                     break;
00134 
00135                 if (a < track->markersnr - 1 && track->markers[a + 1].framenr > i)
00136                     break;
00137 
00138                 a++;
00139             }
00140 
00141             if (a < track->markersnr)
00142                 marker = &track->markers[a];
00143             else
00144                 marker = &track->markers[track->markersnr - 1];
00145 
00146             if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0) {
00147                 framenr = marker->framenr;
00148 
00149                 if (framenr != i)
00150                     glColor4ub(128, 128, 0, 96);
00151                 else if ((marker->flag & MARKER_TRACKED) == 0)
00152                     glColor4ub(255, 255, 0, 196);
00153                 else
00154                     glColor4ub(255, 255, 0, 96);
00155 
00156                 glRecti((i - sfra) * framelen, 0, (i - sfra + 1)*framelen, 4);
00157             }
00158         }
00159     }
00160 
00161     /* failed frames */
00162     if (reconstruction->flag & TRACKING_RECONSTRUCTED) {
00163         int n = reconstruction->camnr;
00164         MovieReconstructedCamera *cameras = reconstruction->cameras;
00165 
00166         glColor4ub(255, 0, 0, 96);
00167 
00168         for (i = sfra, a = 0; i <= efra; i++) {
00169             int ok = FALSE;
00170 
00171             while (a < n) {
00172                 if (cameras[a].framenr == i) {
00173                     ok = TRUE;
00174                     break;
00175                 }
00176                 else if (cameras[a].framenr > i) {
00177                     break;
00178                 }
00179 
00180                 a++;
00181             }
00182 
00183             if (!ok)
00184                 glRecti((i - sfra) * framelen, 0, (i - sfra + 1) * framelen, 8);
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00189 
00190     /* current frame */
00191     x = (sc->user.framenr - sfra) / (efra - sfra + 1) * ar->winx;
00192 
00193     UI_ThemeColor(TH_CFRAME);
00194     glRecti(x, 0, x+framelen, 8);
00195 
00196     clip_draw_curfra_label(sc, x, 8.0f);
00197 }

00199 static void draw_movieclip_notes(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar)
00200 {
00201     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00202     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00203     char str[256] = {0};
00204     int block = FALSE;
00205 
00206     if (tracking->stats) {
00207         BLI_strncpy(str, tracking->stats->message, sizeof(str));
00208         block = TRUE;
00209     }
00210     else {
00211         if (sc->flag & SC_LOCK_SELECTION)
00212             strcpy(str, "Locked");
00213     }
00214 
00215     if (str[0])
00216         ED_region_info_draw(ar, str, block, 0.6f);
00217 }

00219 static void verify_buffer_float(ImBuf *ibuf)
00220 {
00221     if (ibuf->rect_float && (ibuf->rect == NULL || (ibuf->userflags & IB_RECT_INVALID))) {
00222         IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 static void draw_movieclip_buffer(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, ImBuf *ibuf,
00227                                   int width, int height, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00228 {
00229     int x, y;
00230     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00231 
00232     /* set zoom */
00233     glPixelZoom(zoomx*width/ibuf->x, zoomy*height/ibuf->y);
00234 
00235     /* find window pixel coordinates of origin */
00236     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, 0.0f, 0.0f, &x, &y);
00237 
00238     if (sc->flag & SC_MUTE_FOOTAGE) {
00239         glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00240         glRectf(x, y, x + zoomx * width, y + zoomy * height);
00241     }
00242     else {
00243         verify_buffer_float(ibuf);
00244 
00245         if (ibuf->rect)
00246             glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
00247     }
00248 
00249     /* draw boundary border for frame if stabilization is enabled */
00250     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_STABLE && clip->tracking.stabilization.flag & TRACKING_2D_STABILIZATION) {
00251         glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00252         glLineStipple(3, 0xaaaa);
00253         glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00254         glEnable(GL_COLOR_LOGIC_OP);
00255         glLogicOp(GL_NOR);
00256 
00257         glPushMatrix();
00258         glTranslatef(x, y, 0);
00259 
00260         glScalef(zoomx, zoomy, 0);
00261         glMultMatrixf(sc->stabmat);
00262 
00263         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00264             glVertex2f(0.0f, 0.0f);
00265             glVertex2f(width, 0.0f);
00266             glVertex2f(width, height);
00267             glVertex2f(0.0f, height);
00268         glEnd();
00269 
00270         glPopMatrix();
00271 
00272         glDisable(GL_COLOR_LOGIC_OP);
00273         glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00274     }
00275 
00276 
00277     /* reset zoom */
00278     glPixelZoom(1.0f, 1.0f);
00279 }
00280 
00281 static void draw_track_path(SpaceClip *sc, MovieClip *UNUSED(clip), MovieTrackingTrack *track)
00282 {
00283     int count = sc->path_length;
00284     int i, a, b, curindex = -1;
00285     float path[102][2];
00286     int tiny = sc->flag&SC_SHOW_TINY_MARKER, framenr;
00287     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00288 
00289     if (count == 0)
00290         return;
00291 
00292     marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, sc->user.framenr);
00293     if (marker->framenr != sc->user.framenr || marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED)
00294         return;
00295 
00296     framenr = marker->framenr;
00297 
00298     a = count;
00299     i = framenr - 1;
00300     while (i >= framenr - count) {
00301         marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, i);
00302 
00303         if (!marker || marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED)
00304             break;
00305 
00306         if (marker->framenr == i) {
00307             add_v2_v2v2(path[--a], marker->pos, track->offset);
00308             ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(sc, path[a], path[a]);
00309 
00310             if (marker->framenr == sc->user.framenr)
00311                 curindex = a;
00312         }
00313         else {
00314             break;
00315         }
00316 
00317         i--;
00318     }
00319 
00320     b = count;
00321     i = framenr;
00322     while (i <= framenr+count) {
00323         marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, i);
00324 
00325         if (!marker || marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED)
00326             break;
00327 
00328         if (marker->framenr == i) {
00329             if (marker->framenr == sc->user.framenr)
00330                 curindex= b;
00331 
00332             add_v2_v2v2(path[b++], marker->pos, track->offset);
00333             ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(sc, path[b-1], path[b-1]);
00334         }
00335         else
00336             break;
00337 
00338         i++;
00339     }
00340 
00341     if (!tiny) {
00342         UI_ThemeColor(TH_MARKER_OUTLINE);
00343 
00344         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)) {
00345             glPointSize(5.0f);
00346             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00347                 for (i = a; i < b; i++) {
00348                     if (i != curindex)
00349                         glVertex2f(path[i][0], path[i][1]);
00350                 }
00351             glEnd();
00352         }
00353 
00354         glLineWidth(3.0f);
00355         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00356             for (i = a; i < b; i++)
00357                 glVertex2f(path[i][0], path[i][1]);
00358         glEnd();
00359         glLineWidth(1.0f);
00360     }
00361 
00362     UI_ThemeColor(TH_PATH_BEFORE);
00363 
00364     if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)) {
00365         glPointSize(3.0f);
00366         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00367             for (i = a; i < b; i++) {
00368                 if (i == count + 1)
00369                     UI_ThemeColor(TH_PATH_AFTER);
00370 
00371                 if (i != curindex)
00372                     glVertex2f(path[i][0], path[i][1]);
00373             }
00374         glEnd();
00375     }
00376 
00377     UI_ThemeColor(TH_PATH_BEFORE);
00378 
00379     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00380         for (i = a; i < b; i++) {
00381             if (i == count + 1)
00382                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_PATH_AFTER);
00383 
00384             glVertex2f(path[i][0], path[i][1]);
00385         }
00386     glEnd();
00387     glPointSize(1.0f);
00388 }
00389 
00390 static void draw_marker_outline(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track, MovieTrackingMarker *marker, float marker_pos[2], int width, int height)
00391 {
00392     int tiny = sc->flag&SC_SHOW_TINY_MARKER;
00393     int show_search = FALSE;
00394     float px[2];
00395 
00396     UI_ThemeColor(TH_MARKER_OUTLINE);
00397 
00398     px[0] = 1.0f / width / sc->zoom;
00399     px[1] = 1.0f / height / sc->zoom;
00400 
00401     if ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0) {
00402         float pos[2];
00403         rctf r;
00404 
00405         BLI_init_rctf(&r, track->pat_min[0], track->pat_max[0], track->pat_min[1], track->pat_max[1]);
00406         add_v2_v2v2(pos, marker->pos, track->offset);
00407 
00408         ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(sc, pos, pos);
00409 
00410         if (BLI_in_rctf(&r, pos[0]-marker_pos[0], pos[1]-marker_pos[1])) {
00411             if (tiny) glPointSize(3.0f);
00412             else glPointSize(4.0f);
00413             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00414                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1]);
00415             glEnd();
00416             glPointSize(1.0f);
00417         }
00418         else {
00419             if (!tiny) glLineWidth(3.0f);
00420             glBegin(GL_LINES);
00421                 glVertex2f(pos[0] + px[0]*2, pos[1]);
00422                 glVertex2f(pos[0] + px[0]*8, pos[1]);
00423 
00424                 glVertex2f(pos[0] - px[0]*2, pos[1]);
00425                 glVertex2f(pos[0] - px[0]*8, pos[1]);
00426 
00427                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] - px[1]*2);
00428                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] - px[1]*8);
00429 
00430                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] + px[1]*2);
00431                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] + px[1]*8);
00432             glEnd();
00433             if (!tiny) glLineWidth(1.0f);
00434         }
00435     }
00436 
00437     /* pattern and search outline */
00438     glPushMatrix();
00439     glTranslatef(marker_pos[0], marker_pos[1], 0);
00440 
00441     if (!tiny)
00442         glLineWidth(3.0f);
00443 
00444     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) {
00445         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00446             glVertex2f(track->pat_min[0], track->pat_min[1]);
00447             glVertex2f(track->pat_max[0], track->pat_min[1]);
00448             glVertex2f(track->pat_max[0], track->pat_max[1]);
00449             glVertex2f(track->pat_min[0], track->pat_max[1]);
00450         glEnd();
00451     }
00452 
00453     show_search = TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) &&
00454                   ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0 || (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) == 0);
00455     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH && show_search) {
00456         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00457             glVertex2f(track->search_min[0], track->search_min[1]);
00458             glVertex2f(track->search_max[0], track->search_min[1]);
00459             glVertex2f(track->search_max[0], track->search_max[1]);
00460             glVertex2f(track->search_min[0], track->search_max[1]);
00461         glEnd();
00462     }
00463     glPopMatrix();
00464 
00465     if (!tiny)
00466         glLineWidth(1.0f);
00467 }
00468 
00469 static void track_colors(MovieTrackingTrack *track, int act, float col[3], float scol[3])
00470 {
00471     if (track->flag & TRACK_CUSTOMCOLOR) {
00472         if (act)
00473             UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_ACT_MARKER, scol);
00474         else
00475             copy_v3_v3(scol, track->color);
00476 
00477         mul_v3_v3fl(col, track->color, 0.5f);
00478     }
00479     else {
00480         UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_MARKER, col);
00481 
00482         if (act)
00483             UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_ACT_MARKER, scol);
00484         else
00485             UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_SEL_MARKER, scol);
00486     }
00487 }
00488 
00489 static void draw_marker_areas(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track, MovieTrackingMarker *marker, float marker_pos[2], int width, int height, int act, int sel)
00490 {
00491     int tiny= sc->flag&SC_SHOW_TINY_MARKER;
00492     int show_search= 0;
00493     float col[3], scol[3], px[2];
00494 
00495     track_colors(track, act, col, scol);
00496 
00497     px[0]= 1.0f / width / sc->zoom;
00498     px[1]= 1.0f / height / sc->zoom;
00499 
00500     /* marker position and offset position */
00501     if ((track->flag&SELECT) == sel && (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0) {
00502         float pos[2];
00503         rctf r;
00504 
00505         if (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) {
00506             if (act)
00507                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00508             else if (track->flag & SELECT)
00509                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_LOCK_MARKER, 64);
00510             else
00511                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_LOCK_MARKER);
00512         }
00513         else {
00514             if (track->flag & SELECT)
00515                 glColor3fv(scol);
00516             else
00517                 glColor3fv(col);
00518         }
00519 
00520         BLI_init_rctf(&r, track->pat_min[0], track->pat_max[0], track->pat_min[1], track->pat_max[1]);
00521         add_v2_v2v2(pos, marker->pos, track->offset);
00522         ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(sc, pos, pos);
00523 
00524         if (BLI_in_rctf(&r, pos[0]-marker_pos[0], pos[1]-marker_pos[1])) {
00525             if (!tiny)
00526                 glPointSize(2.0f);
00527 
00528             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00529                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1]);
00530             glEnd();
00531 
00532             if (!tiny)
00533                 glPointSize(1.0f);
00534         }
00535         else {
00536             glBegin(GL_LINES);
00537                 glVertex2f(pos[0] + px[0]*3, pos[1]);
00538                 glVertex2f(pos[0] + px[0]*7, pos[1]);
00539 
00540                 glVertex2f(pos[0] - px[0]*3, pos[1]);
00541                 glVertex2f(pos[0] - px[0]*7, pos[1]);
00542 
00543                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] - px[1]*3);
00544                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] - px[1]*7);
00545 
00546                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] + px[1]*3);
00547                 glVertex2f(pos[0], pos[1] + px[1]*7);
00548             glEnd();
00549 
00550             glColor3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00551             glLineStipple(3, 0xaaaa);
00552             glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00553             glEnable(GL_COLOR_LOGIC_OP);
00554             glLogicOp(GL_NOR);
00555 
00556             glBegin(GL_LINES);
00557                 glVertex2fv(pos);
00558                 glVertex2fv(marker_pos);
00559             glEnd();
00560 
00561             glDisable(GL_COLOR_LOGIC_OP);
00562             glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00563         }
00564     }
00565 
00566     /* pattern */
00567     glPushMatrix();
00568     glTranslatef(marker_pos[0], marker_pos[1], 0);
00569 
00570     if (tiny) {
00571         glLineStipple(3, 0xaaaa);
00572         glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00573     }
00574 
00575     if ((track->pat_flag & SELECT) == sel && (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN)) {
00576         if (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) {
00577             if (act)
00578                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00579             else if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00580                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_LOCK_MARKER, 64);
00581             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_LOCK_MARKER);
00582         }
00583         else if (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) {
00584             if (act)
00585                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00586             else if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00587                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_DIS_MARKER, 128);
00588             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_DIS_MARKER);
00589         }
00590         else {
00591             if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00592                 glColor3fv(scol);
00593             else glColor3fv(col);
00594         }
00595 
00596         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00597             glVertex2f(track->pat_min[0], track->pat_min[1]);
00598             glVertex2f(track->pat_max[0], track->pat_min[1]);
00599             glVertex2f(track->pat_max[0], track->pat_max[1]);
00600             glVertex2f(track->pat_min[0], track->pat_max[1]);
00601         glEnd();
00602     }
00603 
00604     /* search */
00605     show_search = TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) &&
00606                  ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0 || (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) == 0);
00607     if ((track->search_flag & SELECT) == sel && (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH) && show_search) {
00608         if (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) {
00609             if (act)
00610                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00611             else if (track->search_flag & SELECT)
00612                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_LOCK_MARKER, 64);
00613             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_LOCK_MARKER);
00614         }
00615         else if (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) {
00616             if (act)
00617                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00618             else if (track->search_flag & SELECT)
00619                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_DIS_MARKER, 128);
00620             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_DIS_MARKER);
00621         }
00622         else {
00623             if (track->search_flag & SELECT)
00624                 glColor3fv(scol);
00625             else
00626                 glColor3fv(col);
00627         }
00628 
00629         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00630             glVertex2f(track->search_min[0], track->search_min[1]);
00631             glVertex2f(track->search_max[0], track->search_min[1]);
00632             glVertex2f(track->search_max[0], track->search_max[1]);
00633             glVertex2f(track->search_min[0], track->search_max[1]);
00634         glEnd();
00635     }
00636 
00637     /* pyramid */
00638     if (sel && TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) &&
00639         (track->tracker == TRACKER_KLT) &&
00640         (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0)
00641     {
00642         if (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) {
00643             if (act)
00644                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00645             else if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00646                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_LOCK_MARKER, 64);
00647             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_LOCK_MARKER);
00648         }
00649         else if (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) {
00650             if (act)
00651                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00652             else if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00653                 UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_DIS_MARKER, 128);
00654             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_DIS_MARKER);
00655         }
00656         else {
00657             if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00658                 glColor3fv(scol);
00659             else
00660                 glColor3fv(col);
00661         }
00662 
00663         {
00664             int i = 0;
00665             glPushMatrix();
00666             glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00667             for (i = 1; i < track->pyramid_levels; ++i) {
00668                 glScalef(2.0f, 2.0f, 1.0);
00669             }
00670             /* only draw a pattern for the coarsest level */
00671             glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00672                 glVertex2f(track->pat_min[0], track->pat_min[1]);
00673                 glVertex2f(track->pat_max[0], track->pat_min[1]);
00674                 glVertex2f(track->pat_max[0], track->pat_max[1]);
00675                 glVertex2f(track->pat_min[0], track->pat_max[1]);
00676             glEnd();
00677             glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00678             glPopMatrix();
00679         }
00680     }
00681 
00682     if (tiny)
00683         glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00684 
00685     glPopMatrix();
00686 }
00687 
00688 static void draw_marker_slide_zones(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track, MovieTrackingMarker *marker,
00689                                     float marker_pos[2], int outline, int sel, int act, int width, int height)
00690 {
00691     float x, y, dx, dy, patdx, patdy, searchdx, searchdy, tdx, tdy;
00692     int tiny = sc->flag&SC_SHOW_TINY_MARKER;
00693     float col[3], scol[3], px[2];
00694 
00695     if ((tiny && outline) || (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED))
00696         return;
00697 
00698     if (!TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) || track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)
00699         return;
00700 
00701     track_colors(track, act, col, scol);
00702 
00703     if (outline) {
00704         glLineWidth(3.0f);
00705         UI_ThemeColor(TH_MARKER_OUTLINE);
00706     }
00707 
00708     glPushMatrix();
00709     glTranslatef(marker_pos[0], marker_pos[1], 0);
00710 
00711     dx = 6.0f / width / sc->zoom;
00712     dy = 6.0f / height / sc->zoom;
00713 
00714     patdx = MIN2(dx * 2.0f / 3.0f, (track->pat_max[0] - track->pat_min[0]) / 6.0f);
00715     patdy = MIN2(dy * 2.0f / 3.0f, (track->pat_max[1] - track->pat_min[1]) / 6.0f);
00716 
00717     searchdx = MIN2(dx, (track->search_max[0] - track->search_min[0]) / 6.0f);
00718     searchdy = MIN2(dy, (track->search_max[1] - track->search_min[1]) / 6.0f);
00719 
00720     px[0] = 1.0f / sc->zoom / width / sc->scale;
00721     px[1] = 1.0f / sc->zoom / height / sc->scale;
00722 
00723     if ((sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH) && ((track->search_flag & SELECT) == sel || outline)) {
00724         if (!outline) {
00725             if (track->search_flag & SELECT)
00726                 glColor3fv(scol);
00727             else
00728                 glColor3fv(col);
00729         }
00730 
00731         /* search offset square */
00732         x = track->search_min[0];
00733         y = track->search_max[1];
00734 
00735         tdx = searchdx;
00736         tdy = searchdy;
00737 
00738         if (outline) {
00739             tdx += px[0];
00740             tdy += px[1];
00741         }
00742 
00743         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00744             glVertex3f(x-tdx, y+tdy, 0);
00745             glVertex3f(x+tdx, y+tdy, 0);
00746             glVertex3f(x+tdx, y-tdy, 0);
00747             glVertex3f(x-tdx, y-tdy, 0);
00748         glEnd();
00749 
00750         /* search re-sizing triangle */
00751         x = track->search_max[0];
00752         y = track->search_min[1];
00753 
00754         tdx = searchdx*2.0f;
00755         tdy = searchdy*2.0f;
00756 
00757         if (outline) {
00758             tdx += px[0];
00759             tdy += px[1];
00760         }
00761 
00762         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00763             glVertex3f(x, y, 0);
00764             glVertex3f(x-tdx, y, 0);
00765             glVertex3f(x, y+tdy, 0);
00766         glEnd();
00767     }
00768 
00769     if ((sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) && ((track->pat_flag & SELECT)==sel || outline)) {
00770         if (!outline) {
00771             if (track->pat_flag & SELECT)
00772                 glColor3fv(scol);
00773             else
00774                 glColor3fv(col);
00775         }
00776 
00777         /* pattern offset square */
00778         x = track->pat_min[0];
00779         y = track->pat_max[1];
00780 
00781         tdx = patdx;
00782         tdy = patdy;
00783 
00784         if (outline) {
00785             tdx += px[0];
00786             tdy += px[1];
00787         }
00788 
00789         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00790             glVertex3f(x-tdx, y+tdy, 0);
00791             glVertex3f(x+tdx, y+tdy, 0);
00792             glVertex3f(x+tdx, y-tdy, 0);
00793             glVertex3f(x-tdx, y-tdy, 0);
00794         glEnd();
00795 
00796         /* pattern re-sizing triangle */
00797         x = track->pat_max[0];
00798         y = track->pat_min[1];
00799 
00800         tdx = patdx*2.0f;
00801         tdy = patdy*2.0f;
00802 
00803         if (outline) {
00804             tdx += px[0];
00805             tdy += px[1];
00806         }
00807 
00808         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00809             glVertex3f(x, y, 0);
00810             glVertex3f(x-tdx, y, 0);
00811             glVertex3f(x, y+tdy, 0);
00812         glEnd();
00813     }
00814 
00815     glPopMatrix();
00816 
00817     if (outline)
00818         glLineWidth(1.0f);
00819 }
00820 
00821 static void draw_marker_texts(SpaceClip *sc, MovieTrackingTrack *track, MovieTrackingMarker *marker, float marker_pos[2], int act,
00822                               int width, int height, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00823 {
00824     char str[128] = {0}, state[64] = {0};
00825     float dx= 0.0f, dy = 0.0f, fontsize, pos[3];
00826     uiStyle *style = U.uistyles.first;
00827     int fontid = style->widget.uifont_id;
00828 
00829     if (!TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track))
00830         return;
00831 
00832     BLF_size(fontid, 11.0f, U.dpi);
00833     fontsize = BLF_height_max(fontid);
00834 
00835     if (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) {
00836         if (act)
00837             UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00838         else
00839             UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_DIS_MARKER, 128);
00840     }
00841     else {
00842         if (act)
00843             UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACT_MARKER);
00844         else
00845             UI_ThemeColor(TH_SEL_MARKER);
00846     }
00847 
00848     if ((sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH) &&
00849        ((marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED) == 0 || (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) == 0))
00850     {
00851         dx = track->search_min[0];
00852         dy = track->search_min[1];
00853     }
00854     else if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) {
00855         dx = track->pat_min[0];
00856         dy = track->pat_min[1];
00857     }
00858 
00859     pos[0] = (marker_pos[0] + dx) * width;
00860     pos[1] = (marker_pos[1] + dy) * height;
00861     pos[2] = 0.0f;
00862 
00863     mul_m4_v3(sc->stabmat, pos);
00864 
00865     pos[0] = pos[0]*zoomx;
00866     pos[1] = pos[1]*zoomy - fontsize;
00867 
00868     if (marker->flag & MARKER_DISABLED)
00869         strcpy(state, "disabled");
00870     else if (marker->framenr != sc->user.framenr)
00871         strcpy(state, "estimated");
00872     else if (marker->flag & MARKER_TRACKED)
00873         strcpy(state, "tracked");
00874     else
00875         strcpy(state, "keyframed");
00876 
00877     if (state[0])
00878         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%s: %s", track->name, state);
00879     else
00880         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%s", track->name);
00881 
00882     BLF_position(fontid, pos[0], pos[1], 0.0f);
00883     BLF_draw(fontid, str, sizeof(str));
00884     pos[1] -= fontsize;
00885 
00886     if (track->flag & TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE) {
00887         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Average error: %.3f", track->error);
00888         BLF_position(fontid, pos[0], pos[1], 0.0f);
00889         BLF_draw(fontid, str, sizeof(str));
00890         pos[1] -= fontsize;
00891     }
00892 
00893     if (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED) {
00894         BLF_position(fontid, pos[0], pos[1], 0.0f);
00895         BLF_draw(fontid, "locked", 6);
00896     }
00897 }
00898 
00899 static void view2d_to_region_float(View2D *v2d, float x, float y, float *regionx, float *regiony)
00900 {
00901     /* express given coordinates as proportional values */
00902     x = -v2d->cur.xmin / (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin);
00903     y = -v2d->cur.ymin / (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin);
00904 
00905     /* convert proportional distances to screen coordinates */
00906     *regionx = v2d->mask.xmin + x*(v2d->mask.xmax - v2d->mask.xmin);
00907     *regiony = v2d->mask.ymin + y*(v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin);
00908 }
00909 
00910 static void draw_tracking_tracks(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, MovieClip *clip,
00911                                  int width, int height, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00912 {
00913     float x, y;
00914     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
00915     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(tracking);
00916     MovieTrackingTrack *track, *act_track;
00917     MovieTrackingMarker *marker;
00918     int framenr = sc->user.framenr;
00919     int undistort = sc->user.render_flag & MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_UNDISTORT;
00920     float *marker_pos = NULL, *fp, *active_pos = NULL, cur_pos[2];
00921 
00922     /* ** find window pixel coordinates of origin ** */
00923 
00924     /* UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip return integer values, this could
00925      * lead to 1px flickering when view is locked to selection during playbeck.
00926      * to avoid this flickering, calculate base point in the same way as it happens
00927      * in UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip, but do it in floats here */
00928 
00929     view2d_to_region_float(&ar->v2d, 0.0f, 0.0f, &x, &y);
00930 
00931     glPushMatrix();
00932     glTranslatef(x, y, 0);
00933 
00934     glPushMatrix();
00935     glScalef(zoomx, zoomy, 0);
00936     glMultMatrixf(sc->stabmat);
00937     glScalef(width, height, 0);
00938 
00939     act_track = BKE_tracking_active_track(tracking);
00940 
00941     if (sc->user.render_flag & MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_UNDISTORT) {
00942         int count = 0;
00943 
00944         /* count */
00945         track = tracksbase->first;
00946         while (track) {
00947             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) {
00948                 marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
00949 
00950                 if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker))
00951                     count++;
00952             }
00953 
00954             track = track->next;
00955         }
00956 
00957         /* undistort */
00958         if (count) {
00959             marker_pos = MEM_callocN(2*sizeof(float)*count, "draw_tracking_tracks marker_pos");
00960 
00961             track = tracksbase->first;
00962             fp = marker_pos;
00963             while (track) {
00964                 if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) {
00965                     marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
00966 
00967                     if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
00968                         ED_clip_point_undistorted_pos(sc, marker->pos, fp);
00969 
00970                         if (track == act_track)
00971                             active_pos = fp;
00972 
00973                         fp += 2;
00974                     }
00975                 }
00976 
00977                 track = track->next;
00978             }
00979         }
00980     }
00981 
00982     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_TRACK_PATH) {
00983         track = tracksbase->first;
00984         while (track) {
00985             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0)
00986                 draw_track_path(sc, clip, track);
00987 
00988             track = track->next;
00989         }
00990     }
00991 
00992     /* markers outline and non-selected areas */
00993     track = tracksbase->first;
00994     fp = marker_pos;
00995     while (track) {
00996         if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) {
00997             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
00998 
00999             if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01000                 copy_v2_v2(cur_pos, fp ? fp : marker->pos);
01001 
01002                 draw_marker_outline(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, width, height);
01003                 draw_marker_areas(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, width, height, 0, 0);
01004                 draw_marker_slide_zones(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, 1, 0, 0, width, height);
01005                 draw_marker_slide_zones(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, 0, 0, 0, width, height);
01006 
01007                 if (fp)
01008                     fp += 2;
01009             }
01010         }
01011 
01012         track = track->next;
01013     }
01014 
01015     /* selected areas only, so selection wouldn't be overlapped by
01016      * non-selected areas */
01017     track = tracksbase->first;
01018     fp = marker_pos;
01019     while (track) {
01020         if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) {
01021             int act = track == act_track;
01022             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
01023 
01024             if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01025                 if (!act) {
01026                     copy_v2_v2(cur_pos, fp ? fp : marker->pos);
01027 
01028                     draw_marker_areas(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, width, height, 0, 1);
01029                     draw_marker_slide_zones(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, 0, 1, 0, width, height);
01030                 }
01031 
01032                 if (fp)
01033                     fp += 2;
01034             }
01035         }
01036 
01037         track = track->next;
01038     }
01039 
01040     /* active marker would be displayed on top of everything else */
01041     if (act_track) {
01042         if ((act_track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) {
01043             marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(act_track, framenr);
01044 
01045             if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01046                 copy_v2_v2(cur_pos, active_pos ? active_pos : marker->pos);
01047 
01048                 draw_marker_areas(sc, act_track, marker, cur_pos, width, height, 1, 1);
01049                 draw_marker_slide_zones(sc, act_track, marker, cur_pos, 0, 1, 1, width, height);
01050             }
01051         }
01052     }
01053 
01054     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_BUNDLES) {
01055         MovieTrackingObject *object = BKE_tracking_active_object(tracking);
01056         float pos[4], vec[4], mat[4][4], aspy;
01057 
01058         glEnable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
01059         glPointSize(3.0f);
01060 
01061         aspy = 1.0f / clip->tracking.camera.pixel_aspect;
01062         BKE_tracking_projection_matrix(tracking, object, framenr, width, height, mat);
01063 
01064         track = tracksbase->first;
01065         while (track) {
01066             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN) == 0 && track->flag & TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE) {
01067                 marker= BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
01068 
01069                 if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01070                     float npos[2];
01071                     copy_v4_v4(vec, track->bundle_pos);
01072                     vec[3]=1;
01073 
01074                     mul_v4_m4v4(pos, mat, vec);
01075 
01076                     pos[0] = (pos[0] / (pos[3] * 2.0f) + 0.5f) * width;
01077                     pos[1] = (pos[1] / (pos[3] * 2.0f) + 0.5f) * height * aspy;
01078 
01079                     BKE_tracking_apply_intrinsics(tracking, pos, npos);
01080 
01081                     if (npos[0] >= 0.0f && npos[1] >= 0.0f && npos[0] <= width && npos[1] <= height * aspy) {
01082                         vec[0] = (marker->pos[0] + track->offset[0]) * width;
01083                         vec[1] = (marker->pos[1] + track->offset[1]) * height * aspy;
01084 
01085                         sub_v2_v2(vec, npos);
01086 
01087                         if (len_v2(vec)< 3.0f)
01088                             glColor3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
01089                         else
01090                             glColor3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01091 
01092                         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
01093                             if (undistort)
01094                                 glVertex3f(pos[0] / width, pos[1] / (height * aspy), 0);
01095                             else
01096                                 glVertex3f(npos[0] / width, npos[1] / (height * aspy), 0);
01097                         glEnd();
01098                     }
01099                 }
01100             }
01101 
01102             track = track->next;
01103         }
01104 
01105         glPointSize(1.0f);
01106         glDisable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
01107     }
01108 
01109     glPopMatrix();
01110 
01111     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_NAMES) {
01112         /* scaling should be cleared before drawing texts, otherwise font would also be scaled */
01113         track = tracksbase->first;
01114         fp = marker_pos;
01115         while (track) {
01116             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN) == 0) {
01117                 marker = BKE_tracking_get_marker(track, framenr);
01118 
01119                 if (MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)) {
01120                     int act = track == act_track;
01121 
01122                     copy_v2_v2(cur_pos, fp ? fp : marker->pos);
01123 
01124                     draw_marker_texts(sc, track, marker, cur_pos, act, width, height, zoomx, zoomy);
01125 
01126                     if (fp)
01127                         fp += 2;
01128                 }
01129             }
01130 
01131             track = track->next;
01132         }
01133     }
01134 
01135     glPopMatrix();
01136 
01137     if (marker_pos)
01138         MEM_freeN(marker_pos);
01139 }
01140 
01141 static void draw_distortion(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, MovieClip *clip, int width, int height, float zoomx, float zoomy)
01142 {
01143     float x, y;
01144     const int n = 10;
01145     int i, j, a;
01146     float pos[2], tpos[2], grid[11][11][2];
01147     MovieTracking *tracking = &clip->tracking;
01148     float aspy = 1.0f / tracking->camera.pixel_aspect;
01149     float dx = (float)width / n, dy = (float)height / n * aspy;
01150 
01151     if (sc->mode != SC_MODE_DISTORTION)
01152         return;
01153 
01154     if (!tracking->camera.focal)
01155         return;
01156 
01157     if ((sc->flag & SC_SHOW_GRID) == 0 && (sc->flag & SC_MANUAL_CALIBRATION) == 0)
01158         return;
01159 
01160     view2d_to_region_float(&ar->v2d, 0.0f, 0.0f, &x, &y);
01161 
01162     glPushMatrix();
01163     glTranslatef(x, y, 0);
01164     glScalef(zoomx, zoomy, 0);
01165     glMultMatrixf(sc->stabmat);
01166     glScalef(width, height, 0);
01167 
01168     /* grid */
01169     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_GRID) {
01170         float val[4][2], idx[4][2];
01171         float min[2], max[2];
01172 
01173         for (a = 0; a < 4; a++) {
01174             if (a < 2)
01175                 val[a][a%2] = FLT_MAX;
01176             else
01177                 val[a][a%2] = -FLT_MAX;
01178         }
01179 
01180         zero_v2(pos);
01181         for (i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
01182             for (j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
01183                 if (i == 0 || j == 0 || i == n || j == n) {
01184                     BKE_tracking_apply_intrinsics(tracking, pos, tpos);
01185 
01186                     for (a = 0; a < 4; a++) {
01187                         int ok;
01188 
01189                         if (a<2)
01190                             ok = tpos[a%2] < val[a][a%2];
01191                         else
01192                             ok= tpos[a%2] > val[a][a%2];
01193 
01194                         if (ok) {
01195                             copy_v2_v2(val[a], tpos);
01196                             idx[a][0] = j;
01197                             idx[a][1] = i;
01198                         }
01199                     }
01200                 }
01201 
01202                 pos[0] += dx;
01203             }
01204 
01205             pos[0] = 0.0f;
01206             pos[1] += dy;
01207         }
01208 
01209         INIT_MINMAX2(min, max);
01210 
01211         for (a = 0; a < 4; a++) {
01212             pos[0] = idx[a][0] * dx;
01213             pos[1] = idx[a][1] * dy;
01214 
01215             BKE_tracking_invert_intrinsics(tracking, pos, tpos);
01216 
01217             DO_MINMAX2(tpos, min, max);
01218         }
01219 
01220         copy_v2_v2(pos, min);
01221         dx = (max[0] - min[0]) / n;
01222         dy = (max[1] - min[1]) / n;
01223 
01224         for (i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
01225             for (j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
01226                 BKE_tracking_apply_intrinsics(tracking, pos, grid[i][j]);
01227 
01228                 grid[i][j][0] /= width;
01229                 grid[i][j][1] /= height*aspy;
01230 
01231                 pos[0] += dx;
01232             }
01233 
01234             pos[0] = min[0];
01235             pos[1] += dy;
01236         }
01237 
01238         glColor3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01239 
01240         for (i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
01241             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01242                 for (j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
01243                     glVertex2fv(grid[i][j]);
01244                 }
01245             glEnd();
01246         }
01247 
01248         for (j = 0; j <= n; j++) {
01249             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01250                 for (i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
01251                     glVertex2fv(grid[i][j]);
01252                 }
01253             glEnd();
01254         }
01255     }
01256 
01257     if (sc->flag & SC_MANUAL_CALIBRATION && clip->gpd) {
01258         bGPDlayer *layer= clip->gpd->layers.first;
01259 
01260         while (layer) {
01261             bGPDframe *frame = layer->frames.first;
01262 
01263             if (layer->flag & GP_LAYER_HIDE) {
01264                 layer = layer->next;
01265                 continue;
01266             }
01267 
01268             glColor4fv(layer->color);
01269             glLineWidth(layer->thickness);
01270             glPointSize((float)(layer->thickness + 2));
01271 
01272             while (frame) {
01273                 bGPDstroke *stroke = frame->strokes.first;
01274 
01275                 while (stroke) {
01276                     if (stroke->flag & GP_STROKE_2DSPACE) {
01277                         if (stroke->totpoints > 1) {
01278                             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01279                                 for (i = 0; i < stroke->totpoints - 1; i++) {
01280                                     float npos[2], dpos[2], len;
01281                                     int steps;
01282 
01283                                     pos[0] = stroke->points[i].x * width;
01284                                     pos[1] = stroke->points[i].y * height * aspy;
01285 
01286                                     npos[0] = stroke->points[i+1].x * width;
01287                                     npos[1] = stroke->points[i+1].y * height * aspy;
01288 
01289                                     len = len_v2v2(pos, npos);
01290                                     steps= ceil(len/5.0f);
01291 
01292                                     /* we want to distort only long straight lines */
01293                                     if (stroke->totpoints == 2) {
01294                                         BKE_tracking_invert_intrinsics(tracking, pos, pos);
01295                                         BKE_tracking_invert_intrinsics(tracking, npos, npos);
01296                                     }
01297 
01298                                     sub_v2_v2v2(dpos, npos, pos);
01299                                     mul_v2_fl(dpos, 1.0f/steps);
01300 
01301                                     for (j = 0; j <= steps; j++) {
01302                                         BKE_tracking_apply_intrinsics(tracking, pos, tpos);
01303                                         glVertex2f(tpos[0]/width, tpos[1]/(height*aspy));
01304 
01305                                         add_v2_v2(pos, dpos);
01306                                     }
01307                                 }
01308                             glEnd();
01309                         }
01310                         else if (stroke->totpoints == 1) {
01311                             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
01312                                 glVertex2f(stroke->points[0].x, stroke->points[0].y);
01313                             glEnd();
01314                         }
01315                     }
01316 
01317                     stroke = stroke->next;
01318                 }
01319 
01320                 frame = frame->next;
01321             }
01322 
01323             layer = layer->next;
01324         }
01325 
01326         glLineWidth(1.0f);
01327         glPointSize(1.0f);
01328     }
01329 
01330     glPopMatrix();
01331 }
01332 
01333 void clip_draw_main(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene)
01334 {
01335     MovieClip *clip= ED_space_clip(sc);
01336     ImBuf *ibuf;
01337     int width, height;
01338     float zoomx, zoomy;
01339 
01340     /* if no clip, nothing to do */
01341     if (!clip)
01342         return;
01343 
01344     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
01345     ED_space_clip_zoom(sc, ar, &zoomx, &zoomy);
01346 
01347     if (sc->flag & SC_SHOW_STABLE) {
01348         float smat[4][4], ismat[4][4];
01349 
01350         ibuf = ED_space_clip_get_stable_buffer(sc, sc->loc, &sc->scale, &sc->angle);
01351 
01352         if (ibuf) {
01353             float loc[2];
01354             float aspect = clip->tracking.camera.pixel_aspect;
01355 
01356             if (width != ibuf->x)
01357                 mul_v2_v2fl(loc, sc->loc, (float)width / ibuf->x);
01358             else
01359                 copy_v2_v2(loc, sc->loc);
01360 
01361             BKE_tracking_stabdata_to_mat4(width, height, aspect, loc, sc->scale, sc->angle, sc->stabmat);
01362 
01363             unit_m4(smat);
01364             smat[0][0] = 1.0f / width;
01365             smat[1][1] = 1.0f / height;
01366             invert_m4_m4(ismat, smat);
01367 
01368             mul_serie_m4(sc->unistabmat, smat, sc->stabmat, ismat, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01369         }
01370     }
01371     else {
01372         ibuf = ED_space_clip_get_buffer(sc);
01373 
01374         zero_v2(sc->loc);
01375         sc->scale = 1.0f;
01376         unit_m4(sc->stabmat);
01377         unit_m4(sc->unistabmat);
01378     }
01379 
01380     if (ibuf) {
01381         draw_movieclip_buffer(sc, ar, ibuf, width, height, zoomx, zoomy);
01382         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01383 
01384         draw_tracking_tracks(sc, ar, clip, width, height, zoomx, zoomy);
01385         draw_distortion(sc, ar, clip, width, height, zoomx, zoomy);
01386     }
01387 
01388     draw_movieclip_cache(sc, ar, clip, scene);
01389     draw_movieclip_notes(sc, ar);
01390 }
01391 
01392 /* draw grease pencil */
01393 void clip_draw_grease_pencil(bContext *C, int onlyv2d)
01394 {
01395     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
01396     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
01397     ImBuf *ibuf;
01398 
01399     if (!clip)
01400         return;
01401 
01402     if (onlyv2d) {
01403         /* if manual calibration is used then grease pencil data is already
01404          * drawed in draw_distortion */
01405         if ((sc->flag & SC_MANUAL_CALIBRATION)==0 || sc->mode != SC_MODE_DISTORTION) {
01406             ibuf = ED_space_clip_get_buffer(sc);
01407 
01408             if (ibuf) {
01409                 glPushMatrix();
01410                 glMultMatrixf(sc->unistabmat);
01411                 draw_gpencil_2dimage(C, ibuf);
01412 
01413                 IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01414                 glPopMatrix();
01415             }
01416         }
01417     }
01418     else {
01419         draw_gpencil_view2d(C, 0);
01420     }
01421 }
